insights.title: Peak Booking Time
insights.description: The most popular booking hour is 10:00, accounting for 13.6% of all bookings.

insights.title: Peak Booking Day
insights.description: Saturday is the most popular day for bookings, accounting for 16.5% of all bookings.

insights.title: Most Popular Course
insights.description: A is the most popular course, accounting for 49.3% of all bookings.

insights.title: High Cancellation Rate
insights.description: Lid Comfort has the highest cancellation rate at 38.7%.

insights.title: Arrival Rate
insights.description: The overall arrival rate is 59.5% of all bookings.

insights.title: Cancellation Rate
insights.description: The overall cancellation rate is 18.6% of all bookings.

insights.title: Temperature Effect
insights.description: There is a moderate positive correlation (0.6) between temperature and booking volume.

insights.title: Rain Effect on Cancellations
insights.description: Rainy conditions increase cancellation rates by 7.3 percentage points compared to non-rainy conditions.

insights.title: Most Popular Booking Channel
insights.description: The most popular booking channel is Online via Chronogolf (Mobile), accounting for 45.2% of all bookings.

recommendations.title: Optimize Staff Allocation
recommendations.description: Increase staff during peak booking hours around 10:00 to ensure smooth operations and customer satisfaction.

recommendations.title: Balance Course Utilization
recommendations.description: Create promotions for less utilized courses to balance demand with A, which is currently the most popular.

recommendations.title: Targeted Cancellation Policy
recommendations.description: Implement a more stringent cancellation policy specifically for Lid Comfort players who show higher cancellation rates.

recommendations.title: Booking Channel Enhancement
recommendations.description: Invest in improving the Online booking experience via Chronogolf as it's the most popular booking channel.
